item.description:
Calling all who like fun!

Celebrate with your tall friends at the Boston Beanstalks.

All returning/previous members and their friends are welcome.

  • Music
  • Fun activities and door prizes
  • Bring a dish or seasonal treats to share. (No ability to warm things back up.  If it's suppose to be hot, heat it up before you leave and wrap it in towels for the trip.)
  • Room for dancing if the spirit moves you.
  • Mixologist on hand, cash bar (this is a VFW so drinks are substantially cheaper than elsewhere).
  • Yankee Swap - if you choose to participate, bring a wrapped, $10.00 gift. (Give one, get one with a twist)
item.name: Holiday Party
